name: Richard Leakey
children: 3, including Louise Leakey   '''Richard Erskine Frere Leakey''' FRS (born 19 December 1944) was a Kenyan palaeoanthropologist, conservationist and politician. Leakey held a number of official positions in Kenya, mostly in institutions of archaeology and wildlife conservation. He been Director of the National Museum of Kenya, founded the NGO WildlifeDirect and is the chairman of the Kenya Wildlife Service. |
